item.description: This will be the second meetup for & about energy work in Somerville. Following on the co-created model of the first meetup, the evening will involve time for networking and connections, group meditation, and learning about different modalities (Reiki, EFT, Polarity/RYSE, etc). We'll also get to experience giving and receiving (sharing) energywork! Feel free to bring a small object or crystal for the healing altar and a notebook or journal if you want to note any of your experiences, share contact information, etc. Healthy snacks (with ingredients listed for allergen-sensitive participants) also welcome! As always this evening should be about what best serves YOU, so other ideas and in-the-moment developments are fully embraced and appreciated! <3
item.name: Embracing your Inner Healer (aka "Somerville rocks!")
